articles.description: All the information you need to get ready for NASCAR's Coca-Cola 600, Sunday night at Charlotte Motor Speedway.
articles.content: NASCAR Cup Series drivers will have to wait an extra day for the series' longest and most grueling race, after the Coca-Cola 600 was postponed until Monday because of persistent rain in Concord, Nort… [+3287 chars]

articles.title: Rochester Americans fans throw debris onto ice after coach tells them to get 'properly lubricated' pregame - Russian Machine Never Breaks
articles.description: The Rochester Americans hosted a sold-out crowd of 10,746 at Blue Cross Arena for Game Three of the Eastern Conference Finals Saturday night. With their NHL-affiliated club, the Buffalo Sabres, missing the playoffs and many of the organization's top prospects…
